#  Press Releases 

# 

Liquidity Services Announces Fourth Quarter Fiscal Year 2024 Earnings Conference Call

November 4, 2024 

[PDF Version](/node/20186/pdf)

BETHESDA, Md., Nov. 04, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Liquidity Services (NASDAQ:LQDT), a leading global commerce company powering the circular economy, today announced that it expects to report its fourth quarter fiscal year 2024 results prior to market open on Thursday, December 12, 2024. Bill Angrick, Chairman and CEO, and Jorge Celaya, EVP and CFO, will then host a conference call to review the results at 10:30 AM Eastern Time.

To participate in the conference call, please [register here](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=Wk3BH2xNAC4Jf1iw0lptzIAGBkcWkemb6IdKL-mnWL5qwp_C98XIz3aovoYpU4vOX7ZrRpldlYIT_7n057-xaZ3b_HJdhuGPpuvcUT6ZVpL-II-NO3z4wt014RrqFhcbU4XO7-HNJzSYVYFDYP6TmA==) to receive the dial-in number and unique conference pin. A [listen-only live webcast of the conference call](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=qZNwugDdFJ6ITaUcWreGWR3RBW4UygWFMzKJt0qQOFHS5JaRwK0qTQYx4zVRexKY2E9R_AJIDZ5TTbssGatdu73PXPG8aHcWN6FgrZiYWlD0CCgSXG-Mcsc0G2jGNdnXLkH_lZkUsuvz8CKGeKaRyiL6iWFkqxqgaeFxQinPWmo=) will also be provided on the Company’s [investor relations site](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=DrwAw_7YGc55kXHCHLSii1kPiybMS3xyRoKs092NnKXSOG4eW2KeJUy02LAaGb43YkIBuU3SRpllzS3yZ9ULvaNIf3vOHh3ru6T2zNUlPJy7RmLadMf_tTC_WFcHJp3s8rGkuxF3QtHr8TSWUT5p9w==).

An archive of the webcast will be available on the Company’s website until August 8, 2025 at 11:59PM Eastern Time. To listen to the replay, visit the Liquidity Services [investor relations site](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=DrwAw_7YGc55kXHCHLSii1kPiybMS3xyRoKs092NnKXd9kTEsqpD8tNGl-tVi6oiiJjnEogwlLm-EfNzxYgzxiKicmeEdzZKmxZjYsCiY5XQj0sAWswiechX4_aXQ08d62MuL7202PvsL5xWrL5tqw==). The replay will be available starting at 1:30 PM Eastern Time on the day of the call.

**About Liquidity Services**[Liquidity Services](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=pa5vmyjaoQ0VCW98SYCptGs1ROBADM5j1pNLfyEsPwAdP1utcjLUxivfftL1DFjz6oFmP3jfRhKMeIB3cAs3PvHwn5kQiGvH8hpMY7O_OiQ=) (NASDAQ: LQDT) operates the world's largest B2B e-commerce marketplace platform for surplus assets with over $10 billion in completed transactions to more than five million qualified buyers and 15,000 corporate and government sellers worldwide. The company supports its clients' sustainability efforts by helping them extend the life of assets, prevent unnecessary waste and carbon emissions, and reduce the number of products headed to landfills.

**Contact:** Liquidity ServicesInvestor Relations[investorrelations@liquidityservicesinc.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=DrwAw_7YGc55kXHCHLSii5xa9J-YYd9op8n_51SGeqvOrKLI8-OPOux6bgeAe93X6DIYigpT7oGwngtaGVqrChTC8-kDZZcISTE2FoNI_lrumqSN8VZW7FT8Bdewz-udbi_P6DyAfySeJa9G-MaTHTAF6Q0YXMC-XkmF3RBB6Zg=)
